title: i can't completely remove league of legends
body:
my league bugged when i went in game and i got a bugsplat i every time i try to reconect i got a bugsplat.  i restarted my com and it dind't work. kept getting bugsplat so i tried deliting it and now i found almost everthing but some file somewhere i can't delete. so i can't download a the game again.
when i try deleting it at the deliting schreen (idk what it is called in English) but that one says : the given acount already exist.
can someone help me?

replies.body:
Hmmm....this sounds odd.  What is the name of the file you are attempting to delete?  Can you take a screenshot of the exact error message you receive?

Let me know!

https://gyazo.com/9dd5d0dff3d7dd79bb4d3143b58c9fd5 is when i try to delete "bestaat al" = already exist


https://gyazo.com/ce538afa9b687669043a4e45c695f5e6 is when to download translates to 

There is already installed a different version of this product. the instalation of this version can not complete. permanently bypass the Programs from the Control Panel to configure the existing version of this product or remove

and when go i there i get the first masage.

The best bet at this point is to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  One of our Tech Specialists can work with you one-on-one in order to get this resolved!

Wish I could offer better help here on Boards though >.<
